Table of Contents

NAME

seqdeinterlace - deinterlace image sequence

SYNOPSIS

seqdeinterlace [-ss] seqfile1 seqfile2

OPTIONS

-ss
Supersample -- interlace both top and bottom fields to separate frames.

DESCRIPTION

seqdeinterlace converts interlaced-scanned images of sequence seqfile1 to progressive-scanned images which are output to seqfile2 via QccIMGImageSequenceDeinterlace(3) .

SEE ALSO

QccIMGImageSequenceDeinterlace(3) , QccIMGImageSequence(3) , QccPackIMG(3) , QccPack(3)

AUTHOR
